content.detailedDescription: I happened to go outside around 7p et. i saw a red light in the sky over the direction of dallas, ga. at first i thought it was a helicopter because it was stationary but then it started moving erratically all over the sky. it appeared in the path of arrival patter for katl but it wasn't a plane. it was shooting all over the sky. it wasn't a laser or a drone. i would say it moved miles between changing directions faster than any helicopter could. it moved up, down, left and right and below the tree line and back up. i can't estimate the speed but it was faster than any helicopter could move in such a short time. it was to the east, west and south of jupiter which i know because it's super bright white in the sky.
content.summary: Flashing red light erratically changing directions

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog when she started to look up and bark i looked up and felt a hummig sound and some kind of static in my body told her to carry on and be quiet but she kept on then lay down i looked up and saw two lighs incircling each other and watched them change shape and colour while my dog was still lay down she was grouwing and did a poo on the floor t had gone out of sight by that time pick it up and walked home
content.summary: Two circles pulsating around each oth then stopping and twisting again while lights flashesed off then on

content.detailedDescription:
While watching airport traffic (commercial, jauan santamaria airport, costa rica), at 370 degrees northwest of ciudad colon, i and another witnessed a very large oblong object appear from very high altitude and descend almost vertically until it disappeared behind the northern rim of the central valley.   this sighting was remarkable, because it left no trail, suggesting a meteorite, the speed was much slower than a meteorite and the object remained a brilliant white light throughout it's descent.

being a pilot, i don't believe this was a conventional aircraft, and although i cannot judge the distance, it did disappear behind the far rim of the valley which is easily 20 miles from the point of observation.

considering the distance of the mountain range, and the size of the object, and the fact that i can't tell how far beyond the mountain range it was, this object must have been huge.

i followed it's descent and saw no flash indicating an impact, or anything else that compares this to a meteor event....The object left no trail, no color other than the object being brilliant white. moved slower than a meter descending nearly vertically,relative to the observer, and judging by the distance i can confirm, it must have been huge.

today, i have watched the costa rican media today and have seen no other mention or reports, thus far.
content.summary: Oblong object descended from high altitude, nearly vertical to the observer, and disappeared behind mountains.

content.detailedDescription: I was hiking with my family at the historic railroad trail in lake mead nra. it was 8 pm when we were on our way back to our car from hiking.  it was around the beginning of spring and there was still some daylight.  i quickly turned around and decided to take just a few more pictures right before we left.  that's when i noticed in my camera a bright round shape on the lcd screen while taking the picture. after looking at the 3 second preview shot on my camera, i was confused as to what i was looking at.  so, then i looked at the actual view and it wasn't there anymore. didn't think much of it, until i got in the car and zoomed in and compared it to another picture i took seconds right before.  attached are the picture taken from the sighting. the one without the orb was taken right before the picture with the orb.
content.summary: An orb-like sighting at a hiking trail in lake mead national recreation area.

content.detailedDescription:
When the weather is nice, i put a foam pad and sleeping bag in the back of my pickup truck and sleep out under the stars. i just went to bed laying on my back looking up at the stars. i saw a bright white flash of light, like a flash camera at 20 feet away, directly over head. a couple of seconds later there was a second flash of light. there was absolutely no noise. then i saw a dimly lit elliptical shaped object move out to the east. it was visible for about two full seconds then it went dark.
i've also seen orange lights, orbs. one night as many as eight.
i've also seen a iridescent green fireball travel from horizon (east) to horizon (west) in 3 or 4 seconds. no noise.
and more....
content.summary: Two bright flashes of white light, then dim lit elliptical shaped object moved out eastward.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my bedroom, just looking at the sky. when i suddenly saw the flashing lights. it hovered for a few seconds then moved slowly. at first i thought it was a drone or something. but the way it made me felt, was so terrifying, i knew there was something paranormal. i was so scared and frozen by the time i could get my phone, it had disappeared. i instantly googled "ufo sightings, and what to do" and it linked me to this report. i hope i'm not going insane and other people have witnessed this too.
content.summary: Unexcpected, spine chilling, froze, terrifying, paranormal.

content.detailedDescription: Ma reggel háromnegyed 8-kor fotóztam hegyeshalomnál. nem repülőgép az biztos. egyértelműen lefelé zuhanó, nem teljesen egyenes vonalban és  nagyon fényes gömb alakú valamit láttam.
content.summary: Crashed or landed sphere shaped ufo at hegyeshalom, hungary

content.detailedDescription: Talking to a co-worker on a golf course. i noticed a star that was very bright and i had the thought is that moving and blew it off instantly trying to pay attention to the conversation. out of the corner of my eye i noticed a light in the north west shoot straight down leaving a trail but not like a shooting star and the fastest i've ever seen anything move. and it just completely vanished trail and all. i looked to the west where the star was and it was gone. it happened over where a radio tower is located and blinking airplane lights in the distance. a period of maybe 30 seconds between me noticing a star like light high up in western sky and the light shooting down in the nw sky.
content.summary: Bright star in west high up then in nw shot down extremely fast and just disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was working in the area when my ipod started to turn off/glitch randomly and i felt uneasy like i was being watched, like the feeling you get walking though a dark house after watching the ring or some other scary movie. it was a nice day overall and i had my ipod with me to catch sunset shots later that day. i stood up and went outside for fresh air and looked up and saw them i watched the objects for about 10-20min trying to identify them there were no nba games or events at the nearby stadium and ruled out blimps. and normal air traffic was still going on and ruled out planes large and small i am used to seeing jets and advertising planes and was easy to know these were not one. i suspected a drone but drones in the city are loud and when it flew behind the building i zeroed in on it and realized that it was much farther away than first thought and at that range a drone would not be visible at all and it still had a good size to it at that range meant it must be 2/3 the size of a plane at least. i took video evidence and for a while was unsure weather it was worth reporting and just kept it for myself to look at randomly. it should be noted as i was taking video my ipod had 100 percent full battery but as i was filming the low battery warning would keep popping up and the ipod would power down and then another small clip then power down, after a few decent shots i gave up and just finished watching the things for another 30-40 min. they appeared out of thin air se of the main building and  went behind the tall building and as it passed going n it disappeared off in the distance all the while at a constant speed while visible. i did walk around the building to see if they went off into the distance naturally but as far as i could tell that did not seem to be the case. the objects are white/grey and semi reflective cylinder/cigar shaped with a small spec of something on lower dead center. video was filmed on ipod touch 5th gen mkj02ll/a. form my standing position in a open parking lot. when filming the teal and tan building is northeast and the 55w building is my north. also saw a regular plane filmed for comparison. filmed in downtown orlando fl jan 16th 2016 2-3pm.
content.summary: Multiple ufos appear and disappear over the course of a hour or so.

content.detailedDescription: I was doing my hair in the window because my mirror is against the window when i saw a bright ball of light hovering when it suddenly zoomed off leaving a bright trail of light and it suddenly disapered and i couldnt see anything
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright ball of light stationary zomed off with light path and disapered

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 1030 hours i had a flock of geese near my duplex, more arriving so i got my camera and took some pic's of incoming geese. i did not notice anything else in the sky. upon placing my chip in the computer i find there are (5), five disks hovering above the area directly north of my unit. i do have some nice photo's. time ran from about 1030 to 1045.
content.summary: Taking pictures of geese landing near my duplex, fog had just lifted. upon checking my photo's, there are five (5) disks hovering above.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were hanging out at the park, watching the stars. we were watching an object in the sky. the object was moving back and forth and in circles above us. we then saw 2 more objects, moving around. as she was watching the first object we saw, i looked around and watched another object about a mile away from us falling from the sky. she had also seen it out of the corner of her eye. this object was was really bright, and looked like a firework descending from the sky. when we looked back to where the 3 moving objects were, they had disappeared. we decided to walk towards where we thought the object had fallen. as we walked around we could smell an usual burnt fuel. street lights around us would turn off an on, even though they are light censored, not motion.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw 3 objects moving in the sky, and then a falling object about a mile away from our location

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting family outside of town..Small, rural, spread out community by the saint mary's river. beautiful night, cold, clear and moonlit. i walk all the time, just for fun and excercize..Could not sleep so i got up and saw how light and beautiful it was outside and went for a small walk, i have always been an outdoors person, and love the clear winter air. i walked 50 yards from my family's home and to my right was a field
i stopped to enjoy the sparkling moonlit snow on the field then i saw 3 orbs pop up over the treeline..I thought..Streetlights? they had the same color as the ugly orange streetlights..But there was no roads for streetlights..As soon as they rose above the treeline, they seemed to "see" me and slowly started to spiral toward me. they looked like orange glowing glass balls with a star in the middle (white,bright). in formation they spiraled toward me..Then another family member called out my name..He was following me because he did not understand why i would just up and want to go for as walk at 2:00 a.M on a cold winter night in the middle of nowhere..My desire to go out was outsized..I felt i must at all costs go for a walk! he called out my name and as soon as he did that..The orbs disappeared..All i can say is..I think he saved my life. i was alone and totally vulnerable..He said he thought he saw something..But i know i did.
content.summary: Sighted 3 orange,glass-like orbs @ 300 yards over treeline..They popped up.."saw" me, then spiraled toward me.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my back yard patio, noticed a red light approx 5 miles away to the n.W. approx 4-5000 ft in altitude. lights are not uncommon as planes always pass thru this area going to city airports. this object did not move for 2 minutes, this is why i paid more attention. i got my binoculars, that's when i saw the object had 2 red lights like car headlights. the object after being stationary for several minutes made a rapid move north, maybe 1-2 miles in 5 seconds. stayed stationary again for a minute, slowly moved back to original position. stayed a couple minutes, then started moving slowly,50-60 mph to the northwest, flew maybe 8 miles, lights beginning to dim a little due to distance. then as if in reverse, flew back over same path to original spot where i first noticed the lights. stayed stationary a couple minutes, then the best part happened, it moved east, slowly, then rapidly descended at an angle due east going from approx 4-5000 ft in altitude to less then 500 ft in 10 seconds, at this point i lost visual because the light descended to the point the roof of the house behind blocked the vision of the lights. i watched for it's return to rise above the neighborhood houses for 10 minutes and gave up. it was night so i have so no visual other then lights. this is the 4th time i have witnessed something very unusual, last time was 15 years ago and that was the ultimate experience. i'm sending this to see if anyone else reported this sighting, i'm not asking if aliens exist, i know they do.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 bright red lights like car headlights, size unknown

content.detailedDescription: While setting on my front porch one morning i heard several jet sounds coming from the west. i was looking up into a grey sky that was actually over cast when something caught my eye to the west. i looked down and saw the profile of what i thought to be a b2 bomber.The profile was right but, almost as soon as i saw it in profile, about 3 seconds it made an abrupt left turn to the north giving me a full view of its underside. there were no markings or numbers and it was navy gray. same as the clouds it flew into. at that point i did see white silt in the wings  next to the cockpit on both sides until it disappeared into the clouds to the north.I believe it to be man made but a covert  or prototype bomber not known to the public as yet. do you know?
content.summary: B2 in configuration but with no wing configuration like b2. no flaps, no insignia.

content.detailedDescription:
1. walk with friends in the nature.
2. the day after by viewing parts from the video camera used during the walk.
3. some optical reflections.
4. to fast to be made by man.
5. n/a
6. i never saw it, but my video camera got more then just nature by accident.
content.summary: Fast moving objects

content.detailedDescription: A white beam of light from an invisible spaceship was shined down on me from the sky outside on the shore of lake minnetonka on a summer evening at my home. i also witnessed a cube shaped cloud over my house one night, a disc shaped cloud and square shaped clouds over me during the day, and triangular shaped clouds over the lake. and there appeared to be multiple types of translucent extraterrestrials inside of my house as if the extraterrestrials were using invisibility technology.
content.summary: White beam of light from invisible spaceship.

content.detailedDescription: I exited my house at a moment past 7:00 pm on 1/18/2017 to go out to dinner.  as i was putting the key in my car door to unlock it, i glanced up.  over our house and a little to the right of it, about 60 degrees up, a series of lights caught my attention.  i instantly thought they seemed peculiar.  the object to which the lights were attached was a triangle.  there were white lights on the three points and a red flashing light in the middle.  the object was going painfully slow.  it proceeded towards bays mountain and gently banked to the left (the right side went up a bit) and it proceeded more directly south.  i kept hoping someone would come by so i could point it out to them, but no one did.  i did glance at my watch to document the time and it was precisely 7:10 pm.  there were no aircraft in the area and it did not make any noise.  i could not tell its altitude, but it was probably around 5-10,00 feet.  not as high as commercial air traffic.  i did notice that it seemed a little "fuzzy" towards the front end.  the air was chilly, but the sky was crystal clear.  after a few moments it just gently moved on towards the south and i proceeded to dinner.  i specifically looked to see if there were traditional aircraft navigation lights and all i was was the one bright, flashing light in the center.  the duration of the experience was perhaps 4-5 minutes because it seemed in no hurry.  regarding my feelings, i was noncommittal.  there it was and i actually chuckled at the thought of seeing a possible ufo - then i just studied it for details, noted the time and went to dinner.  i anticipated filing this report today.
content.summary: Triangle overhead moving slowly towards bays mountain then banking south

content.detailedDescription:
Walking out of my building compound, looked up to the sky and noticed the slow moving object that had the appearance of a star. i instantly knew it was a ufo as i had witnessed before nearby this area. the object was moving then hovering and then moving again, slightly higher than the cloud that was close to it. i continued walking to my destination and did not take long looking at the object as i had seen this similar type before. i believe the sky above kuala lumpur city centre would make a good location for ufo searchers. 

previous ufo's that i had witnessed in this area include:

* moving and hovering stars similar to the one i described above but orange in colour. capable of brightening and changing direction. 

*  3 objects with glowing blue lights flying over the twin towers as if they were fireflies.  eventually the objects came close to each other and ascended above the clouds.

* object with blinking lights (red & blue) capable of hovering, moving at high speed, and changing directions. could not make of the shape.
content.summary: Appeared just like a star but moving and hovering.
content.locationName: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur

content.detailedDescription:
Mz girlfriend and i went to a coaster park. last year in august...  my complete life i see things that nodboy else can see...

since a seeing iam nearly blind and can only see 2 percent of complete. 
so we was in the park and go into a seeing tower ho is 50 meter high. on top i beileive seeing a  invisible objekt direkt in front of me 100 meter away. but nobody else does. first i thought okay you are blind could be that it' happens to them... . than 2 times more in the day. 

 now i was looking at the pics and there it is.. but not invisible 

i make two photos maybe 3 seconds between. the clouds and everything is same and both are make at 17:01 

in the heaven is an ufo far away. 

just see self

my hole live every 8-10 week i had a sleep peralyse and men that anyone is in the room and since ian a child they are always 3 and always the same essence
content.summary: 2 moments seeing a ufo ho nobody else was seeing . and that in a coaster park  now i found a pic

content.detailedDescription: Husband came home from work about midnight. something made him look up in the sky and he saw two red orbs with white edges hovering in the southeast, right above the treeline.There was no sound. there were no planes or helicopters that he could see. the orbs pulsated, hovered, and moved erratically, changing directions in a way a plane or helicopter could not. he took photos with his cell phone. the first photo turned up just static, but the other two show the orbs clearly and how they changed shape. my husband came into the house to tell me about it and show. when we walked out together, the orbs were gone.
content.summary: Two red orbs with white on edges, pulsating, changed shape.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were sitting outside on the porch in the dark listening to the night sounds. it was 11:30 or later and a common practice for us. the neighbors dogs started barking and it almost sounded like they were terrified. we glanced across the valley in that direction and saw a light wandering through the woods not very high off the ground, maybe as tall as someone carrying a light. it wandered out of the woods and to the edge of the pasture.
i turned to my husband and said, "oh, it's just some hunters hunting." he said, "it's somebody doing something but they aren't hunting." the moment we got done speaking the light froze, then it took a silent run/flight straight up a mountainside to the highest peak, shot straight into the air and disappeared. i again turned to my husband and said,"what the heck was that?" 
the orb was around 2 ft. in diameter and glowed a greenish color. there was no way anything should have been able to hear us at that distance across the valley. i have never seen anything as fast as that orb. the territory and path it took was rocky with downed fences and trees everywhere,rough territory. it didn't hit a thing, slow it's speed or make a sound. this happened a long time ago but i will never forget it. i got the impression that whatever it was heard us and was afraid.
content.summary: Saw the light wandering in woods, paused when i spoke to husband then rocketed to top of mountain,shot straight up into sky and was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dogs when i noticed the intensity of the red light hovering in the sky.  the light pulsated.  i would estimate it was 2 to 5 miles away, over the everglades.  the movement was like you typically  hear of  ufo's  with abrupt direction changes.  at one point i saw a less intense white light come from the red light.  the white light descended downward and within seconds it disappeared.   the whole event lasted less than 3 minutes before the red light descended below the roof line and i lost sight.  my first reaction when seeing the intensity of the light was curiosity.  when the light made 3 abrupt changes in direction going from motionless to a quick constant speed with no natural acceleration, i immediately thought ufo.  upon reflection i'm convinced this was a ufo.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Intense pulsating red light hovering then abrupt directional changes, shed a smaller white light

content.detailedDescription: In august of 1993 i was on a date with a woman i had meet a couple of days before. after we had dinner she drove us to a secluded rest stop about 20 to 30 minutes north of downtown spokane, wa. we parker car she put the roof down on her convertible and we got in the backseat, i don't remember how long we were there but i was amazed how many stars i could see because there wasn't any "light pollution". i was looking straight up and noticed (what i thought at first was a shooting star) a star or baseball light bright light moving diagonally from the top right down to the bottom left of the night sky. then it stopped for about 1-3 minutes then it went in a completely different direction (90° from the direction it came from) speed off and vanished. as soon as we lost sight of it both of us had goosebumps, our heads felt "fuzzy" and we left the area immediately and went back into town. before what i saw i had a photographic memory and then afterwards about a day later parts of my short term and long term memory were and still to this day are blank. i'm including a drawing of what i saw and how it moved.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a moving object that stopped and then went in a 90-degree direction then it sped up and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from work at about 11:30 to 11:40 i saw a bright light in the sky, then i noticed three blinking light off to the right of the big light. all 4 lights were in a line  at a angle, with the brighter light higher then the rest. i was not moving so i stopped to watch it, i flicked my lighter twice and the bright like got brighter almost like it pointed in my direction, this was unsettling so i called my brother to get him to come to me to see it, thats when it started moving, all the lights making me think it was one craft but i could only see the lights there was no outline or shape, moving the lights stayed in place at a angle moving forward, i dont know how far it moved but it must of been big to cover ground like the in such a short amount of time, then it shot strate up at at incredible speeds, lighting up the clouds as it passed through them. i dont know what i just saw but it made no sound as it moved.It was off to the right of big tower power lines.
content.summary: Larg light with three strobing lights, hovered ,then moved forward then up into the clouds at a angle, fast!!

content.detailedDescription: saw the light after i took the picture looks like an object shooting out of water .
content.summary: Yellowish trail of light following an object
content.locationName: Taipei - yehliu geopark, New Taipei City

content.detailedDescription: (djs) email submission by witness; "my son noticed it first around 8pm, he pointed out to me out the west window of my home, thought nothing of it until 9pm when i went past that window to head to the bathroom and then i saw it again, so i paused to watch for a minute and it slowly went north.  i then opened my window to see if i could hear helicopter wings but i didn’t… the light was a solid white light, no blinking other colors like helicopters… it then moved back south, it was bright and close enough if a helicopter it would have been heard.  i called 911… the officer came out and saw the light as well… he took my information and said he would make a report.  i kept my eye on it until it went past the tree lines in distance… it moved very smoothly and slowly almost graceful, it made my flesh stand the moment i saw it move… it made me excited.  i called my mother to see if she could see it over the lake from her house in whitehall and she couldn’t."
content.summary: Moving bright light over lake michigan

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from my dad's house to my mom's house. when i got very near my mom's house i saw a bright orange light over some condos. maybe a couple thousand feet above it there was a fainter yellow light. as i drove a bit more i had to stop in the middle of the street and watch. it was moving very very slowly and almost right towards my car. i was too in shock to get my camera. as it got closer i noticed that there were also green and red lights on this thing. i figured it was a drone but it kept getting bigger as it got closer. it must have been 100 feet across which is not a drone. it was triangular with a couple of pointed edges on the back. it made a faint humming noise as it passed and i just watched it until i couldn't see it anymore. my estimation for speed is about 40 mph.
content.summary: Black triangle with a red and green light on either "wing" and 2 yellow-orange lights in the center

content.detailedDescription: On the 17th i saw a large object and new it was not a star so went and got binoculars to zoom it in it appeared circular like a saucer and turned on its right side back and forth from whole bottom to its right side continuously it moved very slowly from slightly right to further away.  this lasted about 45 minutes then disappeared i looked for it and saw it appear in the west sky for about 15 mins. then disappeared again.  on the 18th i went out side at 8:30 it was there again doing the same thing scanning for something. it stayed about half hour then i looked over to south sky to see if it had moved but saw nothing then it appeared again but this time after ten mins. it spit into two saucers then just one again as i looked to the south sky i saw the same object but this time it was apparent that there were two separate objects not one they were there at the same time in two different directions.  the both disappeared at same time. there white lights changed after a few mins, to having red in between the white ones and stayed that way for about ten mins. both nights.    i do not know how to transfer video from my phone to this site if someone can inform me i can submit video thank you.
content.summary: Looked like it was scanning for something

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a pilot on the in land river system. in june,of 2014 i was just coming on watch, headed up river to morgantown, 3g stone dock. to deliver mty barges to be loaded with stone. around midnite heading up river i noticed this bright light, up river. it was going up, down, side-to side, like a helicopter looking for something. what i thought was strange is that i couldn't see its red, green, and flashing running lights. as i got closer the most i said to my self i need to pay attention to this thing. (this whole time i still calling it a helicopter, trying to think rationally like a human) at one area in the river just below where that thing was, cause this was right buy the river bank, over a little community. i turned on my search lights to navigate this area, and when i did that. this thing stopped moving, and went in this perfectly straight line (like it was on rails) about 20 miles out of they way, and then did a " u " turn coming back in my direction, but was on pace to intersect over my vessel. i thought also that this " helicopter " did this, and these moves awfully quick ? then it started over the tree line, then over the river, and eventually over my boat. it was blinding bright also when it started over that tree line, then over the river, and above my boat. immediately i noticed this wasn't no helicopter!! i would outside my pilot house to check this thing out flowing me up river above my boat. it was only less than 500 ft above me. it's was cigar/tylenol pill shaped at each end underneath this thing to use lights in there was this strange symbol marking in the tween them lights. i keep trying to read it, but gave up cause it wasn't writing. it was a strange symbol, or marking if some kind. it was completely silent. finally after the 4th-5th time i ran out side my pilot house, i ran back on to give my boat a steer, and then grab my iphone to film this thing, and i noticed out of my port forward pilot house window it was turning, and flying away. i grabbed my iphone, scanned area to see where it was, and it was on the western bank, the morgantown side above the tree line like a ball of light. like i seen from the beginning. i snapped a picture of it, and then it started picking up speed, and then shot away at high speed around a high rise building, and was gone.
i saw it again 3 days later when i got of the boat with my girl freind at the drive inn, but it was like 20/30 miles away, and like a ball of light, or comet with no tail going across the sky.
one year later in washington co, about 45 miles away. i found a crop circle formation. what was weird about it was that every plant in this formation which was huge, like 600 ft long, every plants top node was swelled, and bent in a 45 degree angle. there was thousands of plants matted down to make the formation, and the ones out side the formation was affected.
i took sample plants, and many pictures, and videos also.
this light for the next year was seen by many people in south western pa, ohio,west virginia area.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cigar, tylenol oil shaped. two huge lights at each end underneath craft.
